tool_description: A simple api to get the ISO 3166 country code, allowing you to search and get posible results with a couple of chars
title: geoscopy

api_list.name: GetAllofThem
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://geoscopy.p.rapidapi.com/country"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "geoscopy.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
